query:
SELECT did, also_known_as
                                FROM plc.dids
                                WHERE
                                    (
                                        did = $1 OR
                                        also_known_as && ARRAY[$1, 'at://' || $1]
                                    ) AND
                                    EXISTS (
                                        SELECT *
                                        FROM follows.dids
                                        WHERE follows.dids.did = plc.dids.did
                                    )
